TopicTitle: Is possible to see oribt after more SoI changes?

Articles.Content:
Like in topic. I tried to make Jool transfer using Mun assist, but after third SoI change (Kerbin->Mun->Kerbin->Sun) KSP draws me only up to Keribin escape, and I have no idea if I'll reach Jool or not... Is it possible to make KSP show orbits after more SoI changes? Is it definable somewhere?

Edited July 20, 2013 by frik
Got answer.

Conic_Patch_Limit in the settings.cfg file

It defaults to 3. Increase the number if you want more lines drawn out farther on your map. I have mine set to 5. Just be aware, that the lines that are further out are less accurate.
